message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming for a price around $18,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob, but $10,000 is too low for me.  This product is worth a lot more based on its features and value.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
I understand that the product has great features and value, but I'm still not willing to go up to $15,000. How about we meet in the middle from my previous offer at $11,000?
You're getting closer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but $11,000 is still too low.  How about $13,500 and we have a deal?
I'm getting closer to your price, but I still think we can do better. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
You're really close, Bob!  I appreciate you working with me on the price.  How about we split the difference and call it $13,000 even? That's my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not willing to go up to $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $12,750?
